name: Alive (itch) (Nutty Studios)
description:
What Is This Game?

How long can you survive stuck on this island with hordes of monsters trying to make you there meal. Last as long as you can acquiring more and more points the longer you stay alive, get the highest score you can to show your friends who's boss.

Short Term Plans

  • New Playable Characters (Named)
  • Boss enemies
  • More Weapons & Weapon VFX
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Controller Support
  • More Maps
  • Updated Combat System (Players & AIs)

Disclaimer: This is a working prototype at the moment.

I want to turn this game into something much bigger than it is (I won't go into too much detail yet) so I am releasing this as it is with continuing updates to help fund the development of it. Just to give you a little idea of what this game could grow into, It would be a mini RPG like game with a crafting / building system and various floored dungeons.
